response.msg:
嗯，用户想了解"四海中医 向世界种草中国智慧"的相关信息。从搜索结果看，这其实是一个大型中医药文化国际传播项目，由凤凰卫视和东阿阿胶联合出品。

仔细看看这些资料。这个项目主要通过纪录片形式展现中医药在全球的传播，第一季在2025年11月1日刚刚开播。节目内容挺丰富的，走访了港澳台、欧洲、美洲等地，展示中医药在不同文化背景下的发展和创新。

节目内容设计很用心啊。比如台湾篇展现了高雄老药铺将药材融入麻辣火锅的创新，还有泰雅族用马告、土肉桂等本土草药的智慧。港澳篇则聚焦都市中的中医传承。这种"药食同源"的日常化呈现方式，确实能让外国观众更容易理解中医文化。

注意到这个项目有些独特亮点。它采用了"中医+科技"的叙事方式，比如台北中医诊所引入生物电阻抗检测的案例；还关注印尼将传统草药Jamu做成"盲盒"的年轻化转型。这种传统与现代的结合很有新意。

在国际传播方面，节目邀请了外国专家参与，比如美国中药学博士Eric。凤凰卫视的全球传播渠道也能帮助节目触达更广受众。有数据显示海外对中医的认可度在提升，比如意大利医生组团学习、英国贵族青睐针灸等。

项目背后有坚实的产业支持。东阿阿胶作为联合出品方，依托其千年中医药文化底蕴；广药白云山作为战略合作方提供支持。去年进博会期间启动的仪式也显示其国际推广的定位。

用户可能想深入了解这个文化传播项目的特色和价值。搜索结果中时效性强的内容集中在10月下旬到11月初的节目预热和开播信息，最新动态是11月2日发布的台湾篇深度报道。这些应该是用户最关心的内容。

节目引发的讨论方向也值得关注。有观点认为中医"天人合一"的理念为现代医学提供新思路；也有讨论聚焦中医国际化面临的挑战与创新。这些不同角度丰富了项目的内涵。


“四海中医：向世界种草中国智慧”是凤凰卫视与东阿阿胶联合打造的大型中医药文化国际传播项目，通过纪录片等形式展现中医药在全球的传承与创新，旨在推动中医文化走向世界。以下是核心信息整理：
### 一、项目背景与定位
1. **联合出品**：凤凰卫视与东阿阿胶共同发起，广药白云山战略合作，于2024年进博会期间启动。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 3, "data": {"num": [26, 36], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "凤凰周刊", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5098519857989993", "index": 36, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "Miss-颜颜", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5099282719576830", "index": 26, "label": ""}], "name": "凤凰周刊", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.828.828.50/001nM6KVly8h8vm9rzz1oj60n00n0js102.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762079160&ssig=WLYlPtIRFh", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5098519857989993", "vType": 3}}```
2. **核心目标**：以全球视野解读中医药文化，打破“古老医术”刻板印象，将其转化为可感知的“生活智慧”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 4, "data": {"num": [9, 10], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "鞠茉汐", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228435901251944", "index": 9, "label": ""}, {"name": "夏野小橙子", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228324101818693", "index": 10, "label": ""}]}}```
3. **首播时间**：2025年11月1日起，每周六22:00在凤凰卫视全媒体平台两集连播。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 5, "data": {"num": [1, 13], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "东阿阿胶", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227907754757380", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "东阿阿胶", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228111596880135", "index": 13, "label": ""}]}}```
东阿阿胶

### 二、内容亮点：传统与现代的融合
1. **地域化叙事**
- **台湾篇《光阴的味道》**：
- 探访高雄百年药铺，将肉桂等辛香料融入麻辣火锅，诠释“药食同源”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 9, "data": {"num": [2, 24], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "凤凰卫视", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228307890315783", "index": 2, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "凤凰卫视", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228204705977244", "index": 24, "label": ""}], "name": "凤凰卫视", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/001NfW7xly8hwn58bch3vj60go0goaca02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762079160&ssig=vWphBBAVr%2F", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228307890315783", "vType": 3}}```
- 记录泰雅族以马告、土肉桂防蚊疗疾，展现草药与自然共生的智慧。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 10, "data": {"num": [4, 7], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "四海中医", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228315442944349", "index": 4, "label": ""}, {"name": "凤凰周刊", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228466434738859", "index": 7, "label": ""}]}}```
- 台北青草巷创新推出“签单式”青草茶，结合现代养生需求定制配方。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 11, "data": {"num": [4, 9], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "四海中医", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228315442944349", "index": 4, "label": ""}, {"name": "鞠茉汐", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228435901251944", "index": 9, "label": ""}]}}```
- **港澳篇《都市杏林江湖》**：
- 聚焦香港东华医院，揭示19世纪末中医制度化、国际化的首次尝试。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 13, "data": {"num": [3, 34], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "凤凰卫视", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228307886905413", "index": 3, "label": ""}, {"name": "凤凰卫视", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227389338255390", "index": 34, "label": ""}]}}```
- 记录武医同源传统在快节奏都市中的坚守与挑战。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 14, "data": {"num": [3], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "凤凰卫视", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228307886905413", "index": 3, "label": ""}]}}```
- **海外篇章**：
- 印尼将传统草药Jamu转型为“盲盒”产品，吸引年轻群体。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 16, "data": {"num": [9, 22], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "鞠茉汐", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228435901251944", "index": 9, "label": ""}, {"name": "凤凰卫视", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5182813114728585", "index": 22, "label": ""}]}}```
- 意大利医生组团学中医、英国贵族推崇针灸，凸显国际认可。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 17, "data": {"num": [6, 14], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "凤凰卫视", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227741819438094", "index": 6, "label": ""}, {"name": "凤凰卫视", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5224842932521955", "index": 14, "label": ""}]}}```

2. **科技赋能中医**
- 台北中医诊所引入生物电阻抗检测，结合大数据分析体质，推动诊疗精准化。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 19, "data": {"num": [4, 20], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "股市安吉拉", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228445915416356", "index": 20, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "四海中医", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228315442944349", "index": 4, "label": ""}], "name": "股市安吉拉", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/6fa97eb5ly8hbr6ophonpj20u00u00up.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762079160&ssig=9JeqXPkVBf", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228445915416356", "vType": 0}}```
- 保留手工炮制药材的百年老店与科技药房并存，体现“守正创新”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 20, "data": {"num": [4, 7], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "四海中医", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228315442944349", "index": 4, "label": ""}, {"name": "凤凰周刊", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228466434738859", "index": 7, "label": ""}]}}```

### 三、传播策略与文化价值
1. **国际视角表达**
- 特邀美籍中药学博士Eric等外国专家参与探访，以跨文化视角解读中医。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 23, "data": {"num": [6, 13], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "凤凰卫视", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227741819438094", "index": 6, "label": ""}, {"name": "东阿阿胶", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228111596880135", "index": 13, "label": ""}]}}```
- 多语言版本覆盖全球，粤语版通过香港台播出，欧美平台同步上线。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 24, "data": {"num": [33], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "黄斌-元御传人", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228293609490392", "index": 33, "label": ""}]}}```

2. **生活化场景渗透**
- 通过梳头养生、穴位按摩等日常实践传递“治未病”理念。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 26, "data": {"num": [8], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "凤凰卫视", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225379737375360", "index": 8, "label": ""}]}}```
- 倡导“喝热水”等低成本养生法，呼应中医“温养阳气”核心。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 27, "data": {"num": [28], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "袁者之", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228192018204100", "index": 28, "label": "大v"}], "name": "袁者之", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/e6242c21ly8huwiggtq5wj20u00u0q42.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762079160&ssig=WrnnkfzZYF", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228192018204100", "vType": 0}}```

3. **产业联动助力**
- 东阿阿胶依托千年文化底蕴，为节目注入产业实践案例。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 29, "data": {"num": [1, 13], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "东阿阿胶", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227907754757380", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "东阿阿胶", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228111596880135", "index": 13, "label": ""}]}}```
- 广药白云山支持中医药标准化、国际化进程。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 30, "data": {"num": [2, 36], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "凤凰卫视", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228307890315783", "index": 2, "label": ""}, {"name": "凤凰周刊", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5098519857989993", "index": 36, "label": ""}]}}```

### 四、社会反响与意义
- **破除偏见**：海外调研显示，中医因“以人为本”的整体观受多国认可，远超“不科学”质疑。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 32, "data": {"num": [14, 21], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "选择中医__董洪涛", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5203513938546277", "index": 21, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "凤凰卫视", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5224842932521955", "index": 14, "label": ""}], "name": "选择中医__董洪涛", "img": "https://tva3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.180.180.50/55fe2b65jw1e8qgp5bmzyj2050050aa8.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762079160&ssig=7fXWHVZ3em", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5203513938546277", "vType": 0}}```
- **女性力量**：穿插历史人物如汉代女医义妁的故事，致敬女性在中医传承中的突破。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 33, "data": {"num": [5], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "Jenny米妮妮", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228436734084031", "index": 5, "label": ""}]}}```
- **文明共振**：节目传递“中医是中华文明钥匙”，引发跨文化健康理念共鸣。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 34, "data": {"num": [6, 10], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "凤凰卫视", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227741819438094", "index": 6, "label": ""}, {"name": "夏野小橙子", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228324101818693", "index": 10, "label": ""}]}}```

**总结**：“四海中医”以纪录片为桥梁，通过在地化叙事、科技融合与生活哲学转化，将中医药打造为全球共享的健康方案。其核心不仅是文化输出，更是文明价值的双向对话——既扎根传统智慧，又回应现代需求。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 35, "data": {"num": [9, 20, 36], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "鞠茉汐", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228435901251944", "index": 9, "label": ""}, {"name": "股市安吉拉", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228445915416356", "index": 20, "label": ""}, {"name": "凤凰周刊", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5098519857989993", "index": 36, "label": ""}]}}```
